metadata.synopsis: The player attempts to use the boat to go to Morphic Pool without all the Netherstones. Doing so is suicide, the Emperor tries to stop you, but will if the player persists will result in a game over.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Load CTY_Main_Agoto -73; -26; 1118 (Emperor Prelude Cave)Get all three stones (nearby debug sign)Drop one of the stonesClick on the boat

0.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
0.text: What is it that you don't understand? If you confront the elder brain now, you will FAIL.

1.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
1.text: Listen to me - this is for your own good. Without all three stones, our efforts here are pointless, dangerous even.

2.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
2.text: Their locations are known to us already. We proceed only when all three are in our possession.

3.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
3.text: It seems you do not value your life, nor the lives of anyone else. Proceed then, and doom us all.

4.speaker: GROUP_Emperors
4.text: You are not ready. You need all the stones before we can proceed.
